pma:database.name: jmw_cms
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `e4hy6_categories` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `asset_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'FK to the #__assets table.', `parent_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lft` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `rgt` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `level` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `path` varchar(400) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `extension` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `title` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `alias` varchar(400) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `note` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` mediumtext COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci, `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `checked_out` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `access` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `params` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci, `metadesc` varchar(1024) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'The meta description for the page.', `metakey` varchar(1024) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'The meta keywords for the page.', `metadata` varchar(2048) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'JSON encoded metadata properties.', `created_user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `created_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `modified_user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `modified_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `hits` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `language` char(7) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `version` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `cat_idx` (`extension`,`published`,`access`), KEY `idx_access` (`access`), KEY `idx_checkout` (`checked_out`), KEY `idx_left_right` (`lft`,`rgt`), KEY `idx_language` (`language`), KEY `idx_path` (`path`(100)), KEY `idx_alias` (`alias`(100)) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=43 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This area includes topics related to the BlackBerry Platform. As a former BlackBerry guy (I used to work for RIM and wrote the first book dedicated to BlackBerry development) I wrote all sorts of articles about BlackBerry device, BlackBerry Device Software, BlackBerry Enterprise Server and of course BlackBerry application development topics. I've since moved on, but these articles remain.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: I've also been a long time IBM Lotus Domino developer, so in this area I'll post articles related to anyting that interests me about IBM Lotus Domino - primarily Notes or Domino development topics.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: I'm interested in many different open source content management systems (CMS), so in this area of the site I'll post articles about particular CMS I'm working with or something related to a specific glitch or feature I've discovered. I'll also try to write about new CMS I've heard of.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This area is for posts that just don't fit anywhere else on the site. If I see something interesting, I'll write about it and post it here.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This area contains articles about all aspects of mobile development. I'll usually post about either a mobile development tool I'm working with or some development issue I'm working on. Included as well are articles in my 'What Were They Thinking?' series where I identify mistakes mobile developers make in their public applications.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This area includes posts related to everything mobile, but not associated with mobile development. I have a separate section here for mobile development topics.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This section includes random posts on topics that just pop into my head every so often.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This category defines links to web sites that I've created or are have information about me or my company.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This category defines sites I simply find interesting for one reason or another.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This category defines links related to BlackBerry development, administration or anything else BlackBerry related.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This category defines links related to IBM Lotus Domino

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This category of links point to John Wargo sightings on the Internet. You'll find links here to articles on other sites, videos, pictures, events and more.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This area of the site contains links to articles I've posted on other web sites. It may also include references to me in other people's articles.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This area of the site contains links to video records I've been involved with. Here you'll find interviews, demonstrations and other videos I'm in.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: Contains links to the different industry conferences and events that I attend.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This area of the site is for articles from guest authors.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This category is for articles about Apache Cordova/Adobe PhoneGap development topics.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This category is for BlackBerry development topics.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: As I work on my books and contribute to the Apache Cordova project, I've been publishing more and more source code on GitHub and NPM. Here you will find links to the different projects I've published.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This section of the site contains articles focused on the silly things developers do when building their apps. Arcitles in this section usually deal with the problems caused by specific implementation decisions developers or designers make.

table.name: e4hy6_categories
table.column: This section covers articles about microcontrollers, single board computers and other IoT topics. Initially, it will contain articles about Arduino and Raspberry Pi projects but will, of course, expand to cover other topics as I continue to play with this stuff.
